title: Exquisite Pushpaka Jhumka Earrings with Tanzanite Drop
materials: Tanzanite. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: These contemporary Jhumka earrings feature a unique floral design. The top is adorned with a round Blue Chalcedony that gives way to diamond encrusted leaves cascading from gold. The floral design at the mid is created using pink sapphires and round diamonds. Each earring is finished with a smooth, drop-shaped Tanzanite gemstone at the base. Secured with a sturdy post and back closure.
occasions: and modern festive occasions. Adds a touch of elegance to both traditional and contemporary outfits. Suitable for Seemantham and half-saree functions.
description: These earrings blend modern design with a touch of traditional Indian aesthetics. The combination of the beautiful blue chalcedony, pink sapphires, tanzanite and sparkling diamonds creates a stunning visual appeal. The fine craftsmanship and Hyderabadi polish guarantee lasting beauty and durability. These Jhumkas are a statement piece that effortlessly elevates any ensemble.
